Technique: (1) Sit in comfortable asan with head and spine straight. Close the Right Nostril and inhale slowly and deeply through left nostril. At the end close both nostril and retain the breath in stomach for few seconds. Exhale slowly through right nostril by keeping left nostril closed. This is one round. Repeat 5-6 times.

Precaution: Never practise after meal. Inhale and exhale very slowly.
